Classes in oracle.apps.fnd.applcore.flex.runtime.resource used by oracle.apps.fnd.applcore.flex.runtime.resource
Bundle
          A resource bundle.
BundleReplicator
          A tool that creates resource bundles for a list of languages from a replicable resource bundle.
FlexfieldBundles
          A collection of flexfield resource bundles.
ReplicableResource
          A resource that contains information about how it can be replicated.
ReplicableResourceBundle
          A resource bundle that contains replicable resources.
ResourceReplicator
          A tools that replicates a resource.
TableResource
          A replicable resource that is based on a translation table in a database.
Translatable
          A string resource that is translatable and replicable.
TranslationTable
          A translation table.
UniversalResource
          A resource that remains the same in all languages.
ViewDefBundle
          A resource bundle in the form of a view object.
